verses.text: The word of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* came again unto me, saying ,
Son of man , set thy face against the Ammonites , and prophesy against them;

And say unto the Ammonites , Hear the word of the Lord 
d \+w GOD|strong="H3069"\+w*
d*; Thus saith the Lord 
d \+w GOD|strong="H3069"\+w*
d*; Because thou saidst , Aha , against my sanctuary , when it was profaned ; and against the land of Israel , when it was desolate ; and against the house of Judah , when they went into captivity ;

Behold, therefore I will deliver thee to the men of the east for a possession , and they shall set their palaces in thee, and make their dwellings in thee: they shall eat thy fruit , and they shall drink thy milk.\f + \fr 25.4 \ft men: Heb. children\f*
And I will make Rabbah a stable for camels , and the Ammonites a couchingplace for flocks : and ye shall know that I \add am\add* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*.

For thus saith the Lord \nd \+w GOD|strong="H3069"\+w*\nd*; Because thou hast clapped \add thine\add* hands , and stamped with the feet , and rejoiced in heart with all thy despite against the land of Israel ;\f + \fr 25.6 \ft hands: Heb. hand\f*\f + \fr 25.6 \ft feet: Heb. foot\f*\f + \fr 25.6 \ft heart: Heb. soul\f*

Behold, therefore I will stretch out mine hand upon thee, and will deliver thee for a spoil to the heathen ; and I will cut thee off from the people , and I will cause thee to perish out of the countries : I will destroy thee; and thou shalt know that I \add am\add* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*.\f + \fr 25.7 \ft a spoil: or, meat\f* \p
¶ Thus saith the Lord \nd \+w GOD|strong="H3069"\+w*\nd*; Because that Moab and Seir do say , Behold, the house of Judah \add is\add* like unto all the heathen ;

Therefore, behold, I will open the side of Moab from the cities , from his cities \add which are\add* on his frontiers , the glory of the country , Beth-jeshimoth , Baal-meon , and Kiriathaim ,\f + \fr 25.9 \ft side…: Heb. shoulder of Moab\f*

Unto the men of the east with the Ammonites , and will give them in possession , that the Ammonites may not be remembered among the nations.\f + \fr 25.10 \ft with…: or, against the children of Ammon\f*
And I will execute judgments upon Moab ; and they shall know that I \add am\add* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*. \p

¶ Thus saith the Lord \nd \+w GOD|strong="H3069"\+w*\nd*; Because that Edom hath dealt against the house of Judah by taking vengeance , and hath greatly offended , and revenged himself upon them;\f + \fr 25.12 \ft by…: Heb. by revenging revengement\f*

Therefore thus saith the Lord \nd \+w GOD|strong="H3069"\+w*\nd*; I will also stretch out mine hand upon Edom , and will cut off man and beast from it; and I will make it desolate from Teman ; and they of Dedan shall fall by the sword.\f + \fr 25.13 \ft they…: or, they shall fall by the sword unto Dedan\f*

And I will lay my vengeance upon Edom by the hand of my people Israel : and they shall do in Edom according to mine anger and according to my fury ; and they shall know my vengeance , saith the Lord \nd \+w GOD|strong="H3069"\+w*\nd*. \p

¶ Thus saith the Lord \nd \+w GOD|strong="H3069"\+w*\nd*; Because the Philistines have dealt by revenge , and have taken vengeance with a despiteful heart , to destroy \add it\add* for the old hatred ;\f + \fr 25.15 \ft for the…: or, with perpetual hatred\f*

Therefore thus saith the Lord \nd \+w GOD|strong="H3069"\+w*\nd*; Behold, I will stretch out mine hand upon the Philistines , and I will cut off the Cherethims , and destroy the remnant of the sea coast.\f + \fr 25.16 \ft sea coast: or, haven of the sea\f*

And I will execute great vengeance upon them with furious rebukes ; and they shall know that I \add am\add* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, when I shall lay my vengeance upon them.\f + \fr 25.17 \ft great vengeance: Heb. great vengeances\f*
